title: Winning back his love
brief_description: Based on the story ‘Winning back her love’ by Anthony Donnelly this silent romantic drama centres around a ‘menage a trois’. Cast includes Stephanie Longfellow, Wilfred Lucas, Vivian Prescott, Edwin August.
description: Based on the story ‘Winning back her love’ by Anthony Donnelly this silent romantic drama centres around a ‘menage a trois’. Cast includes Stephanie Longfellow, Wilfred Lucas, Vivian Prescott, Edwin August.
